Intro:
INTRODUCTION:
Board the Maximus Ship, and journey into an exciting world.
The Maximus will hit an iceberg but you will survive the shipwreck.
Swim to a nearby island where you have to rely on your navigation skills, strategy and survival instinct to survive and escape the island. 
The only way to escape the island and win the game is to explore the island, gather useful items, return to the beach, and build a raft.
Be sure to eat items along the way and sleep to maintain your stamina
Help:
How to Play:

  Click directional arrows on location image to move from location to location.
  Left click on items to add to your inventory.
  Left click on inventory items to view item description and options.
  Navigate through locations and collect required items in order to build a raft for your escape.
  Drop all required items at the beach to build raft.
  Left click on food item to consume and restore stamina.
  Click the bed button to sleep and fully restore your stamina.
  Click setting button to access music and sound effects controls.
  Click floppy disk to save game.
